name: Stifle 32
description:
Defeat escaped lunatic Professor Barker to stop him from destroying Earth.

Retro style game, remake of a homebrew project from the late 90s, initially coded using Turbo Basic on a 486 DX2/66 by Franco S. Remade just for fun/personal nostalgia by Scott M. 

Includes the soundtrack in .mp3 format however the password for the .zip is noted at the end of the in-game credits, so you have to complete the game to get it :)

For the original re-creation of this game, please see https://in4ri.itch.io/stifle

When it asks for a donation, just press 'No thanks, take me to the download'.
